this_title: Miss Sophie - Same Procedure as Every Year
introduction: Who were the missing guests at Miss Sophie’s dinner party in the cult New Year’s Eve sketch DINNER FOR ONE? This prequel series takes us back to the teenage years of the birthday girl, when she is forced to marry out of financial necessity. She invites five wealthy bachelors to her castle. Always by her side: her secret lover, James the butler.
chinese_title: Miss Sophie - Same Procedure as Every Year
